headerDisplay:
## Vantage Controls
Configure your Vantage InFusion controller.

name.title: Name
name.description: A label for this platform entry.

ipaddress.title: Controller IP
ipaddress.description: IP address of your Vantage InFusion controller.

username.title: Username
username.description: Only needed if your controller requires login.

password.title: Password
password.description: Only needed if your controller requires login.

forceSSL.title: Force SSL
forceSSL.description: Skip insecure ports and use 3010/2010 directly.

usecache.title: Use Local Cache
usecache.description: Use previously downloaded configuration (if present) to speed up startup.

omit.title: Omit VIDs
omit.description: Comma-separated list of Vantage object VIDs to skip.

range.title: VID Range
range.description: Include only VIDs within this inclusive range, e.g. 0,5000.
